page.title: 20IN CONCLUSION
page.content:
The work carried out for this project has included a survey of the people of{Merton}.A questionnaire was taken to half the homes in the parish and the information collected has been used in making this response.Other interesting facts discovered include the following:--- Two thirds of the adult residents of{Merton}were born in Devon. More than half the adult residents of{Merton}like the place primarily because it is in the country.
This response has been compiled by the children of Class 1 at the{Clinton {School,Merton }with the help of their Headteacher.Assitance has been given by many other adults in the local community and we are grateful to them. {CLASS.1. THE CLINTON SCHOOL, {MERTON, OKEHAMPTON, DEVON. 19-7-1985
